column2: we were all waffling between several dishes. The reviews for basically everything this place serves are stellar. Eventually
column3: we settled on ordering three different sandwiches and sharing part of it. The young man behind the counter sported some overalls. I had to inquire after them and he said he even has a dress pair. Ladies
column4: he's looking for a special someone that will embrace his fashion choices. Just saying. He was a delight at the counter and made my experience ordering quick and easy.
